other_tests.findings: Opening pressure was 6 mm Hg; CSF had 275 WBCs/mL with 83% segmented neutrophils, 2% bands, 8% lymphocytes, 7% monocytes, and 377 RBCs/mL. Total protein level in the CSF was 160 mg/dL; glucose level was 79 mg/dL.
other_tests.changes_over_time: CSF pleocytosis resolved by the 14th hospital day.

other_tests.findings: Delta-wave activity consistent with diffuse, severe encephalopathy; intermittent sharp contoured forms bitemporally with right-sided predominance noted.
Included an adequate portion of cerebral cortex; predominant findings were perivascular hemorrhagic necrosis with subacute inflammation and patchy demyelination.
